original_text: I told you not to make any agreement with the people who live in this land. I told you to destroy the altars where they worship their gods. But you have not done as I told you. Why have you not obeyed me?
korean_text: 너희는 이 땅의 주민과 언약을 맺지 말며 그들의 제단들을 헐라 하였거늘 너희가 내 목소리를 듣지 아니하였으니 어찌하여 그리하였느냐

sentences.original_text: I told you not to make any agreement
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희가 어떤 계약도 맺지 말라고 말했다

sentences.original_text: with the people who live in this land
I told you to destroy the altars
But you have not done as I told you
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너희는 내가 말한 대로 하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: Why have you not obeyed me?
